alert.note: Alert for Collin; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 5:03PM CDT until June 23 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN ROCKWALL AND SOUTHERN COLLIN COUNTIES... At 503 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lowry Crossing, or near McKinney, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plano, McKinney, Frisco, Richardson, Allen, Wylie, Rockwall, Sachse, Murphy, Royse City, Fairview, Princeton, Lucas, Parker, Farmersville, Lowry Crossing, Lavon, St. Paul, Nevada and Josephine. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
